title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 361 - Siting Of Industrial Hazardous Waste Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 361 - Siting Of Industrial Hazardous Waste Facilities

State Regulations

Subpart 361-1 - Recyclables Handling and Recovery Facilities (§ 361-1.1 to 361-1.6)

Subpart 361-2 - Land Application and Associated Storage Facilities (§ 361-2.1 to 361-2.7)

Subpart 361-3 - Composting and Other Organics Recycling Facilities (§ 361-3.1 to 361-3.9)

Subpart 361-4 - Mulch Processing Facilities (§ 361-4.1 to 361-4.7)

Subpart 361-5 - Construction and Demolition Debris Handling and Recovery Facilities (§ 361-5.1 to 361-5.6)

Subpart 361-6 - Waste Tire Handling and Recovery Facilities (§ 361-6.1 to 361-6.6)

Subpart 361-7 - Scrap Metal Processing and Vehicle Dismantling Facilities (§ 361-7.1 to 361-7.6)

Subpart 361-8 - Used Cooking Oil and Yellow Grease Processing Facilities (§ 361-8.1 to 361-8.6)

Subpart 361-9 - Navigational Dredged Material Handling and Recovery Facilities (§ 361-9.1 to 361-9.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 361

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 3, 5, 7 and 8 of article 17, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0306, titles 1, 7, 19, 23 and 25 of article 27, title 1 of article
70, and titles 27, 35 and 40 of article
71. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
